thread.title: Spotted: Man United outcast takes on role of club photographer at EFL Cup final
thread.title_full: Spotted: Man United outcast takes on role of club photographer at EFL Cup final

title: Spotted: Man United outcast takes on role of club photographer at EFL Cup final
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Spotted: Man United outcast takes on role of club photographer at EFL Cup final BASTIAN SCHWEINSTEIGER took part in Manchester United's EFL Cup celebrations from the other side of the lens, with the 32-year-old relegated to the role of club photographer at Wembley. PUBLISHED: 10:50,   10:59, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 Man United outcast takes on role of club photographer at EFL Cup final Mon, February 27, 2017 Manchester United outcast Bastian Schweinsteiger was relegated to the role of club photographer during the Red Devils' celebrations after their 3-2 EFL Cup final win over Southampton Man Utd via Getty Images 1 of 6 Bastian Schweinsteiger was reduced to the role of club photographer on Sunday 
The German international was not part of Jose Mourinho's matchday squad and found himself taking photos of the victory celebrations , as opposed to joining in. 
Schweinsteiger has struggled at Old Trafford this season after being told he has no future at the club, but the midfielder has forced his way back into contention and recently featured against Saint-Etienne in the Europa League . 
Scroll through the gallery above and try to spot Schweinsteiger during United's celebrations following their 3-2 win over Southampton. Related articles
